text:
A friend who's a comedian praised me the other day.
Nii-chi really catches passes well.

Oh, really? ────I'm glad, but...
I wonder if I'm already getting boring...

────Oh, right!
Just now, they're looking for a new program reporter...

Excuse me,
Is it time for the meeting soon?

Oh, I'm coming now! Well, I might ask for a new job,
so be prepared!

Yes!
Please continue to support us in the future!

────Why aren't there any taxis?
Maybe I should go to a bigger street...

Or rather, why isn't Producer-san
clearing today's schedule?

The dance instructor has already arrived.
Where are you right now?

It's no good.
At this rate, I'll definitely be late...

I'll go by train!
Sorry. I might be a little late!
...Be careful on your way here, Nichika.
